result.name: north-east-coast-discards-survivabilty-2014-15-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
The objective of this study was to assess whether various species of fish 
survive being caught and then being discarded during normal commercial fishing 
practices. This was a scoping study to examine the potential of discard 
survival in gadoid fish. To examine whether immediate survival is present 
after capture and to determine the scope for further research into long term 
discard survival of gadoid fish.
